physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe facial erythema with itching and skin edema developed 24 hours after starting ferrous sulfate treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolved within 5 days after stopping treatment and using systemic corticosteroids and antihistamines.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patch test positive for orange disperse 3 (3+), para-phenylendiamine (3+), and nickel sulfate (3+).
Generalized urticaria, angioedema, wheezing, and dyspnoea occurred during a football match after milk ingestion.
